title: 2018 BMW PGA Championship
text:
The 2018 BMW PGA Championship was the 64th edition of the <a href="BMW%20PGA%20Championship">BMW PGA Championship</a>, an annual <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="European%20Tour">European Tour</a>, held 24–27 May at the West Course of <a href="Wentworth%20Club">Wentworth Club</a> in <a href="Virginia%20Water">Virginia Water</a>, <a href="Surrey">Surrey</a>, <a href="England">England</a>, a suburb southwest of <a href="London">London</a>.
Round summaries.
First round.
"Thursday, 24 May 2018"
Second round.
"Friday, 25 May 2018"
Third round.
"Saturday, 26 May 2018"
Final round.
"Sunday, 27 May 2018"
